column4: hey guys I just logged back into my gnome session from my working xgl session, could someone tell me what this means The X system keyboard settings differ from your current GNOME keyboard settings.  Which set would you like to use? use x settings or use gnome settings
anyone know how i can change my refresh rate im running proper ati drivers at 1280x1024 but can only choose 60hz?
thats an issue with your xorg.conf
